channel.title: Zurich on Nii's Travel Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Zurich on Nii's Travel Blog

item.title: Zurich
item.description: Before we head into Germany, we have a single night in Zurich. The idea was to come to the city during Christmas and enjoy the Christmas markets. This plan completely failed though. Because the Christmas markets actually finish the day before Christmas! So there we were in Zurich, all excited to experience the city. But the entire city was completely dead. The Swiss are apparently quite traditional, so everyone pretty much takes Christmas off.
